content:
Neenaall kooniyirunnoll than-koonu nivartthon mashihaaye!
Paapatthin koonil ninnum-hrdayam chovvaakkeedaname.
Bhoothangall than legiyone-kadalil thaazhtthiya mashihaaye
Dushkrthyam krpayaal thaazhtthi-paapatthe pokkeedenam.
Andhanu kaantiyanachavanaam-sathyavellicham mashihaaye
Nin kalpanaye snehippaan-aathmakkannu thurakkaname.
Thriyekathvavumathupol-ekathve thrithvavumaaya
Pithrputhravishuddhaathmaave!-sathyaikaadheeshaa! Sthothram.
